title: New American Horror Story Season 8 Details!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment:
My theory is that it'll be about Michael Langdon attempting to steal the power of the Salem witches for himself and overthrow Cordelia. A battle between the anti-Christ and the coven to decide the fate of the world. Could call it something like... 
American Horror Story: Supreme

Also maybe a clue to Evan playing Michael could be the fact he’s a hair dresser. Think back to season 1 when constance left Michael with the baby sitter, where was she? A hair salon 💇‍♀️! Is the theme AHS Hair Salon lol?! Jk but it could be a little clue 🧐

A few hours ago there was an influx of articles claiming Emma Roberts is heavily hinting that she's returning AS Madison Montgomery, not just returning in general to play a new character or anything. So it's pretty much a shoe in that at least one dead witch is coming back. That makes me really hopeful for Misty Day. I'm like almost begging for her to return lol.
If your flip the number 8 over it looks like an infinity sign and I think it’s about the legba hell limbo cause ya know they’re there for infinity?

I wasn't particularly a fan of Cult (although I will say it was positively hilarious at times) but I did enjoy it because honestly I'm trash for AHS. I'll watch till it's bitter end. But this season has me more hyped than ever before!!!
